name: Planth Care
description:
A trilogy about taking care of plants. Each of the games is controlled on a different way, some with the keyboard and some with a mic. 

Made by: 

Zaira González - Twitter: @ZaiGC_ // itch.io: Zaira G.

Rubén Jover - Twitter: @Ruben_Jover // itch.io: RubenJover

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FIRST GAME: UMAI

In this game you'll have to make sure that your plant survives as many time as possible. For that you'll have to control the amount of heat and wind that comes through the window.

If the window is closed, temperature begins to rise and the plant can die. When you open the window, air comes in, and it can make the plant fall.

  • Controls: One button game, use the space bar to control the window.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SECOND GAME: PLANTHM

In this game you'll have to make sure that your plant survives while dancing in the sun. If a plant stops moving, you'll have to click on it using the correspondent button on your keyboard.

  • Controls: Full keyboard game, use different buttons to make the plants dance.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THIRD GAME: GARDEN SONGS

**THIS GAME CAN ONLY BE PLAYED IN SPANISH**

In this game you'll have to make sure that your plant survives by making it happy. 

To do so, talk to it using your mic and change its mood. If the plant is sad, try to make it happy by saying nice things.

  • Controls: Voice controlled game, use the mic to talk to the plant.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
